amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Defense Nuclear Nonproliferation (USEC) by $48 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds in the Defense Nuclear Nonproliferation account by $48,000,000 and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 114 - 308 (Roll no. 335).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 114 - 308 (Roll no. 335).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Burgess.
